name: introduction
label: Introduction

name: consensus_note
label: Hi my name is and I work for __________. We are currently conducting a survey on household needs and would like to ask you some questions about your current access to food, income generating activities, health and WASH access, protection services, and humanitarian aid. The survey usually takes around 45 minutes to complete. Any information you provide will be strictly kept anonymous and confidential. This is voluntary and you can choose not to answer any question and/or quit at any point. However, we hope you do participate as your views are important. Do you have any questions? May I begin now?

name: declined_consent
label: If the respondent has declined consent, please end the interview and delete the form.

name: region
label: What region is the assessment being conducted in?

name: district
label: What district is the assessment being conducted in?

name: settlement
label: What is the name of the village/settlement (Not the IDP site name)?

name: settlement_other
label: If other, please specify

name: idp_settlement
label: Is this an IDP settlement? _(Only answer YES if the survey is collected inside an IDP settlement)_

name: idp_settlement_name
label: What is the name of the IDP site/settlement?

name: B
label: Household demographics

name: resp_gender
label: What is the gender of the respondent?

name: resp_age
label: What is the age of the respondent? (For respondents between the age of 12 and 17 please ensure an adult/guardian is present)

name: guardian_present
label: Is there an adult or guardian present?

name: no_guardian
label: If there is no guadian nor adult and the interviewww is a child, please end the interview and delete the form

name: breadwinner
label: Who is the main income-earner of the household?

name: household_expenditure
label: Who decides on household expenditure?

name: hh_ids
label: Does your household have any identity documentation (for example passport or national ID card) in your possession?

name: hh_children
label: Are there children (aged 0-17) in your household?

name: note_hh_demographics
label: Please give the number of household members in this household in each age and gender group, including the respondent

name: demog_list
label: Demographic list

name: males_0_6m

constraint_message: Must be a positive number, and less than 10

constraint_message: Must be a positive number, and less than 10

constraint_message: Must be a positive number, and less than 10

constraint_message: Must be a positive number, and less than 10

name: total_hh_confirm
label: Please confirm the total number of household members is ${total_hh}
constraint_message: If the total number of HH members is incorrect, please review the demographics section for errors

name: person_with_disabilities
label: Persons with disabilities: In your household, are there any members that have physical or cognitive difficulties (for example, mobility, hearing, sight, communicating, etc.) which impacts their ability to carry out day to day activities such as working, studying, walking, getting dressed, remembering things?

name: disabilities_list
label: Disabilities list

name: disa_note
label: How many household members fall into the following categories?

name: no_difficulty
label: a.      No difficulty carrying out daily activities

name: minor_difficulties
label: b.      Minor difficulties carrying daily activities but does not need assistance or attention

name: some_difficulties
label: c.      Some difficulties carrying daily activities and needs some assistance and attention (for e.g. 1-2 hours per day)

name: a_lot
label: d.      A lot of difficulty carrying daily activities and needs quite a bit of assistance and attention (for e.g. 3-6 hours per day)

name: cannot_carry
label: e.      Cannot carry daily activities independently and needs permanent assistance and attention

name: vuln
label: Other

name: plw
label: Is there a female household members who have given birth in the past 6 months or is pregnant?
constraint_message: Should be less than or equal to total females in the age of 13-40 years old

name: chronic
label: In your household, how many members have been sick for more than 6 months or regularly fall sick (e.g. every two months)

name: C
label: Displacement

name: yes_no_host
label: Have you always lived in the settlement you are currently living in?

name: hosting_idp
label: Are you currently hosting any people who are not usually members of this household and who share resources, such as food and water, with you?

name: yes_no_idp
label: Are you a Somali who has moved from another location in Somalia?

name: yes_no_returnee
label: Are you a Somali returning to Somalia from another country?

name: idp
label: Internally displaced

name: region_idp
label: In which region were you living before coming here?

name: district_idp
label: In which district were you living before coming here?

name: settlement_idp
label: In which settlement were you living before coming here?

name: settlement_idp_other
label: Please enter the name of the town, village or neighbourhood

name: returnee
label: Returnee

name: returnee_country
label: From which country is the household returning?

name: returnee_country_other
label: If other, please specify

name: returnee_area
label: From which area of ${returnee_country} is the household returning?

name: returnee_area_other
label: If other, please specify

name: returnee_settlement
label: From which settlement of ${returnee_area} is the household returning?

name: returnee_settlement_other
label: If other, please specify

name: registered_return
label: Did you register for voluntary return with UNHCR or authorities in your place of refugee?

name: refugees
label: Refugee - (Shouldn’t be from Somalia)

name: refugee
label: Are you a person of another nationality who has travelled from another country?
constraint_message: Cannot proceed further - go back to the displacement questions and read the questions carefuly

name: country_origin
label: From which country did this household travel? _(Should not be from Somalia)_

name: why_displaced
label: Reasons for displacement

name: left_aoo
label: When did you leave your area of origin?
constraint_message: Must be before today

name: arrived_current
label: When did you arrive at the current location? (answer cannot be longer than previous answer)
constraint_message: Cannot be before date left AoO

name: locations_lived
label: In total, how many locations have you lived in since leaving your area of origin?

name: displacement_note
label: What are the two main reasons you left your previous location?

name: disp_why1
label: First reason

name: disp_why2
label: Second reason
constraint_message: Can't select same as the first reason

name: disp_current_note
label: What are the top two reasons why you chose to come to this location?

name: dest_loc_why1
label: First reason

name: dest_loc_why2
label: Second reason
constraint_message: Can't select the first reason

name: returnee_remain_here
label: Do you intend to remain and settle in this location permanently?

name: when_continue
label: When will you move to your intended destination?

name: region_intended
label: Region

name: district_intended
label: District

name: settlement_intended
label: Settlement

name: settlement_intended_other
label: Please enter the name of the town, village or neighbourhood

name: D
label: Protection

name: separations
label: Separations

name: separated_members
label: Were any household members separated from the household within the past three months/90 days?

name: separated_members_yes
label: Separated members

name: separations_number
label: Please indicate the number of separated members

name: separated_boys
label: Separated boys (aged 17 and below)
constraint_message: Must not be illogically high

name: separated_girls
label: Separated girls (aged 17 and below)
constraint_message: Must not be illogically high

name: separated_male_assets
label: Adult male who is in other location to protect property/ assets
constraint_message: Must not be illogically high

name: separated_female_assets
label: Adult female who is in other location to protect property/ assets
constraint_message: Must not be illogically high

name: separated_male_other
label: Other adult male members separated
constraint_message: Must not be illogically high

name: separated_female_other
label: Other adult female members separated
constraint_message: Must not be illogically high and should be great than 0

name: separated_reasons
label: What was the reason of the seperation?

name: separated_reasons_other
label: Please specify if other.

name: E
label: Education

name: education_level
label: Education levels

name: education_level_note
label: Has at least one or two person in the household achieved the following?

name: primary_degree
label: Primary level degree (primary school and secondary school)

name: secondary_degree
label: Secondary level degree (high school)

name: vocational_degree
label: Vocational degree (training on specific craft or job, e.g. IT, electrician, cooking, sewing, etc.)

name: tertiary_degree
label: Tertiary degree (university degree)

name: enrollement
label: Enrollment

name: note_enrollement
label: Please specify the age and gender of the children that are currently enrolled in school since the past 3 months/90 days

name: enrolled_boys_5_12
label: How many boys 5-12 are enrolled in school?
constraint_message: Cannot exceed total males of 5-12 years in household

name: enrolled_girls_5_12
label: How many girls 5-12 are enrolled in school?
constraint_message: Cannot exceed total females of 5-12 years in household

name: enrolled_boys_13_17
label: How many boys 13-17 are enrolled school?
constraint_message: Cannot exceed total under 18 male in household

name: enrolled_girls_13_17
label: How many girls 13-17 are enrolled in school?
constraint_message: Cannot exceed total under 18 female in household

name: attendance
label: Attendance

name: note_attendance
label: How many children in the household currently attend school for more than 3 days per week since the past 3 months/90 days?

name: attend_boys_5_12
label: How many boys 5-12 attend education?
constraint_message: Cannot exceed total males of 5-12 years enrolled in school

name: attend_girls_5_12
label: How many girls 5-12 attend education?
constraint_message: Cannot exceed total females of 5-12 years enrolled in school

name: attend_boys_13_17
label: How many boys 13-17 attend education?
constraint_message: Cannot exceed total under 18 male enrolled in school

name: attend_girls_13_17
label: How many girls 13-17 attend education?
constraint_message: Cannot exceed total under 18 female enrolled in school

name: attend_previous
label: They are ${not_attend_total} child(en) that do not attend school regurlary. Were these children attending school for more than 3 days in the last 12months / year?

name: time_school
label: How long does it take you to reach the nearest educational facility (primary, secondary, vocational, quoranic, basic literacy and numeracy classes, university) – either by foot or by available means of transport?

name: access_school
label: Have you been able to access the nearest educational facility when needed?

name: school_barriers
label: School barriers

name: school_barrier_note
label: What are the 3 mains concerns you have for school enrollment or attendance?

name: school_barrier_first
label: First reason

name: school_barrier_second
label: Second reason

name: school_barrier_third
label: Third reason

name: school_barrier_other
label: Other, specify

name: cash_education
label: If available, what would be the main type of support you would require for school enrollment or attendance?

name: cash_education_other
label: Other, specify
